Upgrading to more Advanced Battle Pods allows for full-lance training simulations, as well as raucous ship-wide tournaments. Pilots earn 30XP per day up to 20K XP, may gain the Dependable or Brave quirks, and Mech Bonding levels will not fall below 30.

AssignedCastDescription: Farah just told me that the simulators in Beta Pod can network with the others. You know what that means? It will only take about two years to turn our pilots into a well-trained fighting machine.
